content: r 17 work in rib to marker sm k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 sm continue in rib to end r 18 small/medium work to marker remove marker slip next 14 stitches to waste yarn cast on two stitches using cable cast on continue in rib to end large as round 14 r 19 large only work in rib to marker sm m1r k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 m1l sm continue in rib to end r 20 large only work in rib to marker sm p1 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p1 sm continue in rib to end r 21 large only work in rib to marker sm m1r p1 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p1 m1l sm continue in rib to end r 22 large only work in rib to marker sm p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 sm continue in rib to end r 23 large only work to marker remove marker slip next 18 stitches to waste yarn cast on two stitches using cable cast on continue in rib to end tip you can work more than 18 rounds if work 18 further rounds in rib cast off you want longer glove s the yellow pair has 22 rounds thumb place stitches from waste yarn on needle pick up four stitches 18 stitches small/medium 22 stitches large small/medium k2 p2 three times k1 k2tog p2 k2tog that last k2tog will be the last stitch picked up knitted with the first stitch of the round 16 stitches large p2 k2 four times p1 p2tog k2 p2tog that last p2tog will be the last stitch picked up purled with the first stitch of the round 20 stitches work 7 more rounds in rib cast off weave in ends tip i don t like the look of a rib cast off at the top of a fingerless mitt so i use a plain knit cast off © rachel cooper 2014 chart for right mitten worked over first 24 26 sts only chart for left mitten worked over first 24 26 sts only
